item.title: MIUI OS2.0.104.0.VNMCNXM Recovery update for Redmi K70 Pro China
item.description:

Version: OS2.0.104.0.VNMCNXM | 15.0

Optimization: System stability

Updated the security patch to February 2025. Increased system security.
[Alive Design Philosophy]

AI depth technology layers your wallpaper and clock, creating a unique, movie-like effect.
